website_summaries.verdict: A natural constipation remedy that uses a trio of exotic fruits that have been shown to aid healthy digestion and natural  elimination without causing the runs.
pros: Gentle action is ideal for dogs who may be weak from illness
Unique formulation stimulates natural intestinal movement to help pass stools rather than relying on bulk forming agents or softeners
Promotes healthy liver and gallbladder function to assist digestion
cons: Getting the dosage just right might require some experimentation

customer_reviews.title: Thank the Lord for this product.
customer_reviews.text: My little Bell (cat) is about 7 human years old. She ONLY eats those dry biscuits. Pooping was becoming a BIG problem. I was DESPERATE, and thank the Lord this popped up in my search. I bought this with high hopes. I only give this to her once a day, two drops only, and so far so good. A big blessing in my life for my precious cat. Healthy pooping is VERY important for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is rather expensive, but works great if you have pet with serious constipation. I put drops in a little water and give to small dog with dropper; he seems to like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G.

customer_reviews.title: This seems to work better at keeping her more regular and she seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with a history of IBD. once that cleared, she would occasionally become constipated. She had been on lactulose and laxatone. This seems to work better at keeping her more regular and she seems to like the flavor. The lactulose was a sticky mess getting it down, the laxatone many times would go untouched. She's not "regular" and probably never will be, but she is more "regular" than before and no constipation issues since starting. I do only give it to her once per day, through instructions say twice. This reninds me, I need to order another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could offer more
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old sweetheart has been challenged with constipation this year which is something new. In addition to adding pumpkin to her food, we also use this product. I'm not sure how effective it is since she still struggles. I will continue to use it as her movements are better with it then without.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R Perez

customer_reviews.title: has onot worked yet
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very constipated..the vet said the nerves are failing to push the bm. I purchased this product hoping it would soften and push the bm out. It did not work at all. I am disappointed. I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Mast

customer_reviews.title: Not for cats.
customer_reviews.text: May be it is good for dogs, but in the description it was said that this is for cats too, but it is impossible to give a cat. When mixed with food, they refuse to eat food even when very hungry. When I tried to put it right in the mouth they spit it out. Expensive and wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog after she was diagnosed with adenocarcinoma. She had bowel problems as a result of her condition. While she CLEARLY hated the taste, it did help her.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Can’t mask the taste with anything.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use this without force. My cat won’t even eat her canned food with only 1 drop in it. Waste of money. It might be effective, but we will never know.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: My dogs did not like this product
customer_reviews.text: From the very first my dogs both had a negative reaction by vomiting. Returned product without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Pet helped with anti constipation liquid.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely has helped. It is very mild. It took a few days till Bailey had a BM. Could be a tad stronger!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Buras

customer_reviews.title: Squeeze a few drops in the mouth and your dog will swallow it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good 👍 Easy to administer 👍 And my 19 year old Chihuahua is doing much better going poddy 🙏 A welcomed side effect was that it made my dog relex and a bit easier to fall asleep 👍 So after 2 weeks, here is my advice...... Udjust the the amount up or down if it needed. My dog was going too much so I cut the recommended drops down.
customer_reviews.author: G S

customer_reviews.title: product good  a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: works good this is a good company have ordered many products from them
customer_reviews.author: MONICA

customer_reviews.title: Stop Cling- on issue
customer_reviews.text: My doodle was having Issue getting stool out of fur not cut really short on bum. This product has stopped that from being issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and definitely worth the woney
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say I have a fat 20 pounder cat! He has trouble pooping also due to the fact he doesn’t drink much water, once I started using this mixed with his food I saw a big change. This helps out so much and I can actually fall asleep not being worried about my cat being constipated. Definitely worth the money if your pet isnt able to use the bathroom daily. I was skeptical buying this at first because i wasn’t sure if it would work or not but i have to give all stars because it helps my baby dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

product_meta.title: Pet Wellbeing - Smooth BM Gold for Dogs - Natural Constipation Support for Dogs - 2oz(59ml)
feature_bullets: Enables normal, soft, regular bowel movements in dogs
Effective without over-purging or runny stools
Non-irritating and safe for long-term use
Prepared from organically grown and selectively imported herbs from trusted growers.
